Languages: Understands Deep Speech but doesn't speak

Traits.Name: Cluster and Split
Traits.Content: When reduced to half its hit points, the Hessdalen Lights can split into two smaller orbs that each have half the hit points and the same abilities.

Traits.Name: Radiant Disorientation
Traits.Content: Creatures within 30 feet of the Hessdalen Lights must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw at the start of their turn or be disoriented until the start of their next turn, causing them to have disadvantage on their next attack roll.

Actions.Name: Radiant Pulse
Actions.Content: Spell Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 8 (2d4 + 3) radiant damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Disorienting Flare
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 10 (3d6 + 1) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or suffer disadvantage on its next ability check.

Actions.Name: Orb Burst
Actions.Content: Area Effect: Each creature in a 10-foot radius centered on the Hessdalen Lights must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (3d10 + 1) force damage and be pushed 5 feet away from the Hessdalen Lights.
